Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 53 %

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 37 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
